>> e-Gate (Biometric G ates) Specific Solutions For Specific Needs... This product is the new generation of biometric traffic control gates. These gates use biometric elements to identify the users. The most secure biometric element is iris so it is the main biometric element in this product. But fingerprint and face recognition could be added to the iris module too. This product could be used as a single system or as a client in the network. Oue biometric modules could be used with different gates from different brands . >> Identification and authentication based on fingerprint recognition Your fingerprint is unique to you and never changes â€“ that is what makes it the most common reliable way to identify you. It cannot be forgotten like a password, it cannot be misplaced like a card and it cannot be stolen, unless they steal your fingers! And it is affordable and convenient. >> IRISEC (Biometric access control device) IRISEC is a biometric access control system based on iris recognition. This product can control accessing to security zones, places of equipments. User would input him/her unique registration code with the IRISEC keyboard and then must see his/her eye in the mirror. IRISEC will match the input data with the registered data and if those matched, a relay will send a common to open the door or switch on an equipment. IRISEC can be armed with our other biometric solutions like face or fingerprint recognition and can operate as a multimodal system too. It can be used stand alone or as a client in network.
